title: The weather-cocke of Romes religion: with her seuerall changes. Or: The world turn'd topsie-turuie by papists
author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.
publisher: Printed by George Purslow for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Churchyard in Fleet-streete,
notes: Running title reads: The Roman weather-cocke.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
